faq.title: Beyond Aesthetic Clinic{FAQs}

questions.question: What treatments does Beyond Aesthetic Clinic offer?
questions.answer: Beyond Aesthetic Clinic offers a comprehensive range of aesthetic treatments including anti-wrinkle injections, dermal fillers, skin boosters, chemical peels, HydraFacial, microneedling, laser treatments, body contouring, and specialist skincare consultations. All treatments are doctor-led and use medical-grade products.

questions.question: Are your treatments suitable for all skin types?
questions.answer: Yes, our treatments are designed to be safe and effective for all skin types and tones. During your consultation, our experienced practitioners will assess your skin and recommend treatments tailored to your specific needs and goals.

questions.question: What is body contouring, and how does it work?
questions.answer: Body contouring treatments use advanced technology to target and reduce stubborn fat deposits and improve skin texture without surgery. We offer treatments like EMSculpt and CoolSculpting that work by either breaking down fat cells or building muscle, helping you achieve your desired body shape.

questions.question: How long do aesthetic treatments take?
questions.answer: Treatment times vary depending on the procedure. Injectable treatments typically take 15-30 minutes, while more comprehensive treatments like HydraFacial or body contouring may take 45-90 minutes. Your practitioner will give you a clear timeline during your consultation.

questions.question: Is there any downtime after treatment?
questions.answer: Most of our treatments are designed to have minimal to no downtime, allowing you to return to your daily activities immediately. Some treatments may cause mild redness or swelling that typically subsides within a few hours to days. Your practitioner will provide specific aftercare instructions.

questions.question: How do I know which treatment is right for me?
questions.answer: We offer complimentary consultations where our expert practitioners will assess your concerns, discuss your goals, and recommend a personalized treatment plan. This ensures you receive the most appropriate treatments for your individual needs.

questions.question: Can I combine treatments for a complete transformation?
questions.answer: Yes! Many patients combine treatments for optimal results. Our practitioners can create a comprehensive treatment plan that may include multiple procedures tailored to your specific goals and timeline.

questions.question: How can I book a consultation?
questions.answer: You can book a consultation by calling us directly, using our online booking system, or visiting one of our clinics. We have locations in London (Knightsbridge) and Edinburgh (St Andrew Square).
